definitions.text: the appendage to an object that is designed to be held in order to use or move it
examples: he grabbed the hammer by the handle
it was an old briefcase but it still had a good grip

definitions.text: be in charge of, act on, or dispose of
examples: I can deal with this crew of workers
She managed her parents' affairs after they got too old

definitions.text: act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
examples: The course covered all of Western Civilization
The new book treats the history of China

definitions.text: touch, lift, or hold with the hands

examples: The young violinist didn't manage her bow very well
The prize-winning poodle was handled by Mrs. Priscilla Prescott
